verses.name: Mark 10:1
verses.text: And he arose from thence, and cometh into the coasts of Judea by the farther side of Jordan: and the people resort unto him again; and, as he was wont, he taught them again.

verses.name: Mark 10:2
verses.text: And the Pharisees came to him, and asked him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife? tempting him.

verses.name: Mark 10:3
verses.text: And he answered and said unto them, What did Moses command you?

verses.name: Mark 10:4
verses.text: And they said, Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement, and to put her away.
